articles.author: Stanford Masters
articles.title: In Pics: Volvo unveils C40 Recharge EV SUV for India; to be launched in August - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Volvo has brought its coupe-styled EV, the C40 Recharge, to India. Based on the XC40 already on sale, the C40 gets slightly different styling, the same powertrain, but better range.
